SEARCH
Package com.example.view

Class PromptOption

Object
Prompt
PromptOption
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPrompt
public class PromptOption extends Prompt
PromptOption is a class that inherits from Prompt. We use it when instead of allowing the user to freely enter input we want them to a choose from a few options instead. This helps us minimize our error handling especially in cases when there are only a few valid answers.

  • Constructor Details

    • PromptOption

      public PromptOption(String question, ArrayList<String> options)
      constructor with the question that is displayed to the user as well as an ArrayList of options in the form of String.
      Parameters:
      question - a String that is displayed to the user
      options - an ArrayList of String options for the user to choose from
      Throws:
      PromptOptionException - thrown when there are no options initialised
      See Also:
      • PromptOptionException

    • PromptOption

      public PromptOption(String question, boolean allowEmpty, String defaultValue, ArrayList<String> options)
      constructor with question, boolean, default value and option array list
      Parameters:
      question - a String that is displayed to the user
      allowEmpty - a boolean that decides whether the user can effectively skip the question by pressing enter or not
      defaultValue - displays the default value of the parameter to the user
      options - an ArrayList of String options for the user to choose from

  • Method Details

    • startPrompt

      public void startPrompt()
      Description copied from class: Prompt
      method to start prompting. It checks for a mismatch of input: for example, if the user has not entered any value but it is a compulsory prompt. Or if the user's inputted value does not match specified regex. Then it will continuously prompt the user - and will not move on to the next prompt - till the input conditions are satisfied
      Specified by:
      startPrompt in interface IPrompt
      Overrides:
      startPrompt in class Prompt
